00152         public static bool IsValidStockCode(string value)
00153         {
00154             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(value))
00155             {
00156                 throw new ArgumentNullException("Provided stockcode was null or empty.");
00157             }
00158             else
00159             {
00160                 // TODO: Do not use magic numbers in code
00161                 Regex regexp = new Regex("^[0-9]{4}$");
00162                 return regexp.IsMatch(value);
00163             }
00164 
00165         }

00187         public static bool Validate(String stockCode, String name, String supplierName, double unitCost, int required, int currentStock)
00188         {
00189             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(stockCode) || !IsValidStockCode(stockCode))
00190             {
00191                 ErrorMessages.Add(new ErrorMessage("Need a stockcode that adheres to the stockcode format: 4 numbers."));
00192             }
00193             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(name))
00194             {
00195                 ErrorMessages.Add(new ErrorMessage("Need an item name."));
00196             }
00197             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty("supplierName"))
00198             {
00199                 ErrorMessages.Add(new ErrorMessage("Need a supplier name."));
00200             }
00201             if (unitCost < 0.0)
00202             {
00203                 ErrorMessages.Add(new ErrorMessage("Unit costs must be greater or equal 0."));
00204             }
00205             if (required < 0)
00206             {
00207                 ErrorMessages.Add(new ErrorMessage("Required must be greater or equal 0."));
00208             }
00209             if (currentStock < 0)
00210             {
00211                 ErrorMessages.Add(new ErrorMessage("Current must be greater or equal 0."));
00212             }
00213             return ErrorMessages.Count == 0;
00214         }

00219         {
00220             if (PropertyChanged != null)
00221             {
00222                 PropertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(info));
00223             }

00230         public String CsvRepresentation()
00231         {
00232             return String.Format("{0},{1},{2},{3},{4},{5}", this.StockCode, this.Name, this.SupplierName, this.UnitCost, this.RequiredStock, this.CurrentStock);
00233         }

00240         public StockItem ParseFromString(string stringRepresentation)
00241         {
00242             string[] split = stringRepresentation.Split(',');
00243             String stockCode = split[0];
00244             String name = split[1];
00245             String supplierName = split[2];
00246             String unitCost = split[3];
00247             String requiredStock = split[4];
00248             String currentStock = split[5];
00249             double cost = 0;
00250             int reqStock = 0;
00251             int currStock = 0;
00252             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(unitCost))
00253             {
00254                 try
00255                 {
00256                     cost = double.Parse(unitCost);
00257                 }
00258                 catch (FormatException e)
00259                 {
00260                     Console.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);
00261                 } 
00262             }
00263             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(requiredStock))
00264             {
00265                 try
00266                 {
00267                     reqStock = int.Parse(requiredStock);
00268                 }
00269                 catch (FormatException e)
00270                 {
00271                     Console.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);
00272                 } 
00273             }
00274             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(currentStock))
00275             {
00276                 try
00277                 {
00278                     currStock = int.Parse(currentStock);
00279                 }
00280                 catch (FormatException e)
00281                 {
00282                     Console.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);
00283                 } 
00284             }
00285             return new StockItem(stockCode, name, supplierName, cost, reqStock, currStock);
00286         }
00287     }
